body.title: a)
body.body: Harvest bone marrow cells by flushing femur with ice-cold bone marrow harvesting medium.

body.title: b)
body.body: Filter the suspended cells through 70um cell strainer \(BD Cat. 352350) while keeping cells on ice.

body.title: d)
body.body: centifuge the filtered cells at 1500rpm for 5-10 min.

body.title: e)
body.body: Resuspend the cells with HBSS+ staining buffer \(HBSS+, ~2x10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL if possible).

body.title: a)
body.body: Aliquot 100ul single suspension cells for staining.

body.title: b)
body.body: Prepare controls including unstained sample and  samples stained with single color fluorescence antibody \(antibodies) for FACS compensation.

body.title: c)
body.body: Add 2uL CD45 antibody and other antibodies to 100uL cells and slowly rock in 4ÂºC for 15 min.

body.title: d)
body.body: Spin down the cells at 1500rpm for 7 min and resuspend cell pellets with 200ul ice-cold HBSS+.

body.title: e)
body.body: Add 5-7ul 7-AAD solution into 200ul cells to exclude dead cells during FACS analysis.

body.title: c)
body.body: Run samples and collect FACS data.

body.title: d)
body.body: Analyze your FACS data on CD45-SSC plots.
